data.prayer: Father, move the 33,072 believers in the county of Shahjahanpur to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shahjahanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Shahjahanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, help the 33,072 believers in Shahjahanpur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Shahjahanpur access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Yadav Ghosi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
the county of Shahjahanpur has (about) 33,072 people who know Jesus, 36,479 people who know about him culturally, and 2,936,950 people who are far from Jesus.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Shahjahanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary:
the county of Shahjahanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 3,006,500.

We estimate Shahjahanpur has 33,072 people who might know Jesus, 36,479 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,936,950 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Shahjahanpur. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;
